title: Failed to create file system for "mega2:dev": couldn't login: crypto/aes: invalid key size 0
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

I have a Mega.nz business plan with 3 accounts, to test rclone, and installing in our system I added an account with "rclone config", all commandos worked as desired.

Now I've added 2 other mega accounts from the same business plan, now works only 1 account without problems, the other 2 accounts have the following output for each command:

I tried the latest beta version without success.

`Failed to create file system for "mega:dev2": couldn't login: crypto/aes: invalid key size 0`

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

rclone v1.50.1-046-gb5bb4c2a-beta
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.13.4


#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

Distributor ID: Ubuntu, 64 bit
Description: Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS
Release: 18.04
Codename: bionic


####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

Mega.nz


#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

rclone copy /tmp/testfile.mp4 mega:dev


#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

2019/11/15 14:27:21 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.50.1-046-gb5bb4c2a-beta" starting with parameters ["rclone" "ls" "mega1:" "-vv"]
2019/11/15 14:27:21 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/user/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2019/11/15 14:27:22 Failed to create file system for "mega1:": couldn't login: crypto/aes: invalid key size 0
